EmailTemplate.subject: VMTurbo Top Ten Features #1: Assure Service Performance
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
Welcome to the VMTurbo Top 10 Feature Series! Over the coming weeks, we will be sending you ten guides to unlock the full potential of the VMTurbo platform. Of course, if at any time you want to accelerate your learning, you can visit the Green Circle Community <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/welcome?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-HybridCloud&utm_content=Mid01]]> and gain tips and tricks from real VMTurbo customers and evaluators just like you.
Feature #1: Assure Service Performance
VMTurbo is designed to guarantee application performance. It provides you with with specific automatable actions, in real-time, that combined help you answer the following questions:
- What do I need to do to assure service performance? - How do I eliminate congestion? - How do I mitigate risk? - Am I violating any policies? - Do I need more infrastructure?
Step-By-Step: Assure Service Performance
The following steps will guide you through the Assure Service Performance Dashboard:
- Select Show All to see all Actions - Select Show Top to see the top 10 actions that will guarantee or improve application performance - The Risks column shows the details of risks associated with not taking the actions prescribed by VMTurbo
- Click the ! Icon to toggle between Risks and the To Do list
- Actions can be taken directly from the VMTurbo user interface by selecting the checkbox and clicking Apply - Click the Chart Icon to show more details about the entities at risk and associated with each action generated by VMTurbo - Click the ? Icon of each window for an explanation of that windows contents and if possible, how to modify them - VMTurbo can Automate Actions to Guarantee Performance. To enable automation, click the Policy tab and do the following: - Policy > Action > VM > Choose Cluster > Move > Automated > Click "Apply Settings Change"
Next Feature: Improve Overall Efficiency
